alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Teller (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 5:31PM MDT until July 07 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN FREMONT AND SOUTHERN TELLER COUNTIES... At 531 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cripple Creek, or 18 miles west of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Victor around 535 PM MDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
